verses.verse: וַיִּשְׁמַ֞ע <S%H8085><s%> heard יִתְר֨וֹ <S%H3503><s%> When Jethro כֹהֵ֤ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest מִדְיָן֙ <S%H4080><s%> of Midian חֹתֵ֣ן <S%H2859><s%> father in law מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses' אֵת֩ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after עָשָׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> had done אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> of all that God לְמֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> for Moses וּלְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> and for Israel עַמּ֑וֹ <S%H5971><s%> his people כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> how הוֹצִ֧יא <S%H3318><s%> had brought יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> [and] that the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt

וַיִּקַּ֗ח <S%H3947><s%> took יִתְרוֹ֙ <S%H3503><s%> Then Jethro חֹתֵ֣ן <S%H2859><s%> father in law מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses' אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צִפֹּרָ֖ה <S%H6855><s%> Zipporah אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses' אַחַ֖ר <S%H310><s%> after שִׁלּוּחֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H7964><s%> he had sent her back

וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> And her two בָנֶ֑יהָ <S%H1121><s%> sons אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> of whom שֵׁ֤ם <S%H8034><s%> of which the name הָֽאֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> of the one גֵּֽרְשֹׁ֔ם <S%H1647><s%> [was] Gershom כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אָמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> for he said גֵּ֣ר <S%H1616><s%> I have been an alien הָיִ֔יתִי <S%H1961><s%> have been בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> land נָכְרִיָּֽה׃ <S%H5237><s%> in a strange

וְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> And the name הָאֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> of the other אֱלִיעֶ֑זֶר <S%H461><s%> [was] Eliezer כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> for the God אָבִי֙ <S%H1><s%> of my father בְּעֶזְרִ֔י <S%H5828><s%> [said he was] mine help וַיַּצִּלֵ֖נִי <S%H5337><s%> and delivered מֵחֶ֥רֶב <S%H2719><s%> me from the sword פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh

וַיָּבֹ֞א <S%H935><s%> came יִתְר֨וֹ <S%H3503><s%> And Jethro חֹתֵ֥ן <S%H2859><s%> father in law מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses' וּבָנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> with his sons וְאִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <S%H802><s%> and his wife אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in הַמִּדְבָּ֗ר <S%H4057><s%> into the wilderness אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after ה֛וּא <S%H1931><s%> he חֹנֶ֥ה <S%H2583><s%> where he encamped שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> at הַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> at the mount הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> And he said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses אֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> I חֹתֶנְךָ֥ <S%H2859><s%> I thy father in law יִתְר֖וֹ <S%H3503><s%> Jethro בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> am come אֵלֶ֑יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you וְאִ֨שְׁתְּךָ֔ <S%H802><s%> unto thee and thy wife וּשְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> and her two בָנֶ֖יהָ <S%H1121><s%> sons עִמָּֽהּ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

וַיֵּצֵ֨א <S%H3318><s%> went out מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses לִקְרַ֣את <S%H7125><s%> to meet חֹֽתְנ֗וֹ <S%H2859><s%> his father in law וַיִּשְׁתַּ֙חוּ֙ <S%H7812><s%> and did obeisance וַיִּשַּׁק־ <S%H5401><s%> and kissed ל֔וֹ וַיִּשְׁאֲל֥וּ <S%H7592><s%> him and they asked אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> each לְרֵעֵ֖הוּ <S%H7453><s%> other לְשָׁל֑וֹם <S%H7965><s%> of [their] welfare וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> and they came הָאֹֽהֱלָה׃ <S%H168><s%> into the tent

וַיְסַפֵּ֤ר <S%H5608><s%> told מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> And Moses לְחֹ֣תְנ֔וֹ <S%H2859><s%> his father in law אֵת֩ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after עָשָׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> had done יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> all that the LORD לְפַרְעֹ֣ה <S%H6547><s%> unto Pharaoh וּלְמִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> and to the Egyptians עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> and אוֹדֹ֣ת <S%H182><s%> sake יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> for Israel's אֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַתְּלָאָה֙ <S%H8513><s%> [and] all the travail אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> that מְצָאָ֣תַם <S%H4672><s%> that had come בַּדֶּ֔רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> upon them by the way וַיַּצִּלֵ֖ם <S%H5337><s%> delivered יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> and [how] the LORD

וַיִּ֣חַדְּ <S%H2302><s%> rejoiced יִתְר֔וֹ <S%H3503><s%> And Jethro עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַטּוֹבָ֔ה <S%H2896><s%> for all the goodness אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> had done יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> to Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which הִצִּיל֖וֹ <S%H5337><s%> whom he had delivered מִיַּ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> out of the hand מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian

וַיֹּאמֶר֮ <S%H559><s%> said יִתְרוֹ֒ <S%H3503><s%> And Jethro בָּר֣וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> Blessed יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> [be] the LORD אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who הִצִּ֥יל <S%H5337><s%> who hath delivered אֶתְכֶ֛ם <S%H853><s%> מִיַּ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> you out of the hand מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian וּמִיַּ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> and out of the hand פַּרְעֹ֑ה <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who הִצִּיל֙ <S%H5337><s%> who hath delivered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> the people מִתַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> under יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> from under the hand מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian

עַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> Now יָדַ֔עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> Now I know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> indeed גָד֥וֹל <S%H1419><s%> [is] greater יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> than all gods כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> indeed בַדָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> for in the thing אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> when זָד֖וּ <S%H2102><s%> wherein they dealt proudly עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5921><s%> against

וַיִּקַּ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> took יִתְר֨וֹ <S%H3503><s%> And Jethro חֹתֵ֥ן <S%H2859><s%> father in law מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses' עֹלָ֥ה <S%H5930><s%> a burnt offering וּזְבָחִ֖ים <S%H2077><s%> and sacrifices לֵֽאלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> for God וַיָּבֹ֨א <S%H935><s%> came אַהֲרֹ֜ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron וְכֹ֣ל ׀ <S%H3605><s%> all זִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> and all the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֶאֱכָל־ <S%H398><s%> to eat לֶ֛חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> in חֹתֵ֥ן <S%H2859><s%> father in law מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> with Moses' לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> God

וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came מִֽמָּחֳרָ֔ת <S%H4283><s%> And it came to pass on the morrow וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> sat מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> that Moses לִשְׁפֹּ֣ט <S%H8199><s%> to judge אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> the people וַיַּעֲמֹ֤ד <S%H5975><s%> stood הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> and the people עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> about מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> by Moses מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַבֹּ֖קֶר <S%H1242><s%> from the morning עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> unto the evening

וַיַּרְא֙ <S%H7200><s%> saw חֹתֵ֣ן <S%H2859><s%> father in law מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> And when Moses' אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he עֹשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> all that he did לָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> to the people וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> he said מָֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> What הַדָּבָ֤ר <S%H1697><s%> What [is] this thing הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> is this אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after אַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> you עֹשֶׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> that thou doest לָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> thou thyself alone and all the people מַדּ֗וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> how אַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> you יוֹשֵׁב֙ <S%H3427><s%> sit לְבַדֶּ֔ךָ <S%H910><s%> alone וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> the people נִצָּ֥ב <S%H5324><s%> stand עָלֶ֖יךָ <S%H5921><s%> about מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from בֹּ֥קֶר <S%H1242><s%> by thee from morning עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until עָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> day

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses לְחֹתְנ֑וֹ <S%H2859><s%> unto his father in law כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because יָבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> come אֵלַ֛י <S%H413><s%> about הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> Because the people לִדְרֹ֥שׁ <S%H1875><s%> unto me to enquire אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When יִהְיֶ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> have לָהֶ֤ם דָּבָר֙ <S%H1697><s%> When they have a matter בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> they come אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> to me וְשָׁ֣פַטְתִּ֔י <S%H8199><s%> unto me and I judge בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> between one וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> between רֵעֵ֑הוּ <S%H7453><s%> and another וְהוֹדַעְתִּ֛י <S%H3045><s%> and I do make [them] know אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֻקֵּ֥י <S%H2706><s%> the statutes הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> of God וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תּוֹרֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H8451><s%> and his laws

וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said חֹתֵ֥ן <S%H2859><s%> father in law מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses' אֵלָ֑יו <S%H413><s%> about לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not טוֹב֙ <S%H2896><s%> [is] not good הַדָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> unto him The thing אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you עֹשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> that thou doest

נָבֹ֣ל <S%H5034><s%> Thou wilt surely תִּבֹּ֔ל <S%H5034><s%> wear away גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> both אַתָּ֕ה <S%H859><s%> yourself גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> both הָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> both thou and this people הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> and these אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who עִמָּ֑ךְ <S%H5973><s%> with כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for כָבֵ֤ד <S%H3515><s%> [is] too heavy מִמְּךָ֙ <S%H4480><s%> is too הַדָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> that [is] with thee for this thing לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תוּכַ֥ל <S%H3201><s%> for thee thou art not able עֲשֹׂ֖הוּ <S%H6213><s%> to perform לְבַדֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H910><s%> alone

עַתָּ֞ה <S%H6258><s%> Now שְׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> Hearken בְּקֹלִי֙ <S%H6963><s%> now unto my voice אִיעָ֣צְךָ֔ <S%H3289><s%> I will give thee counsel וִיהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> shall be אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> and God עִמָּ֑ךְ <S%H5973><s%> with הֱיֵ֧ה <S%H1961><s%> become אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you לָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> with thee Be thou for the people מ֚וּל <S%H4136><s%> before הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> unto God וְהֵבֵאתָ֥ <S%H935><s%> that thou mayest bring אַתָּ֛ה <S%H859><s%> you אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> the causes אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> God

וְהִזְהַרְתָּ֣ה <S%H2094><s%> teach אֶתְהֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֻקִּ֖ים <S%H2706><s%> them ordinances וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַתּוֹרֹ֑ת <S%H8451><s%> and laws וְהוֹדַעְתָּ֣ <S%H3045><s%> and shalt shew לָהֶ֗ם אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <S%H1870><s%> them the way יֵ֣לְכוּ <S%H1980><s%> walk בָ֔הּ וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽמַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H4639><s%> and the work אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> they יַעֲשֽׂוּן׃ <S%H6213><s%> that they must do

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you תֶחֱזֶ֣ה <S%H2372><s%> Moreover thou shalt provide מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הָ֠עָם <S%H5971><s%> out of all the people אַנְשֵׁי־ <S%H376><s%> men חַ֜יִל <S%H2428><s%> able יִרְאֵ֧י <S%H3373><s%> such as fear אֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> God אַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H376><s%> men אֱמֶ֖ת <S%H571><s%> of truth שֹׂ֣נְאֵי <S%H8130><s%> hating בָ֑צַע <S%H1215><s%> covetousness וְשַׂמְתָּ֣ <S%H7760><s%> and place עֲלֵהֶ֗ם <S%H5921><s%> over שָׂרֵ֤י <S%H8269><s%> [such] over them [to be] rulers אֲלָפִים֙ <S%H505><s%> of thousands שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> [and] rulers מֵא֔וֹת <S%H3967><s%> of hundreds שָׂרֵ֥י <S%H8269><s%> rulers חֲמִשִּׁ֖ים <S%H2572><s%> of fifties וְשָׂרֵ֥י <S%H8269><s%> and rulers עֲשָׂרֹֽת׃ <S%H6235><s%> of tens
